org.apache.spark

Class SparkHadoopWriter

  • Object
    • org.apache.spark.SparkHadoopWriter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, Logging, SparkHadoopMapRedUtil

    public class SparkHadoopWriter
extends Object
implements Logging, SparkHadoopMapRedUtil, scala.Serializable
    Internal helper class that saves an RDD using a Hadoop OutputFormat.

    Saves the RDD using a JobConf, which should contain an output key class, an output value class, a filename to write to, etc, exactly like in a Hadoop MapReduce job.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form
